body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is William Moore and the customer's name is Amy Hayes.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. My name is William Moore. How may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi William, I'm Amy Hayes. I'm having some issues with my motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Amy. Can you please tell me what specific issues you're experiencing with your motorcycle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It’s making a weird noise and the engine seems to be struggling.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how that can be frustrating. To help you better, could you please provide me with the model of your motorcycle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's a Phat Hog Custom, model year twenty twenty-two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Amy. Can I also get your phone number, please? I want to make sure we can reach you if necessary.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it! And lastly, could you confirm your zip code for me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it’s one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Amy. I have all the details I need. Our service team will reach out to you shortly regarding your motorcycle issue. Thank you for your time today!
